title: Ear of Maize

nouns: Fruit (use Q10757112 for the species, Q8666090 for the genus)
A banana is an edible fruit, botanically a berry, produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.
The tropical treelike plant which bears clusters of bananas. The plant, of the genus Musa, has large, elongated leaves and is related to the plantain.
The tropical treelike plant which bears clusters of bananas. The plant, of the genus Musa, has large, elongated leaves.
Any of several tropical and subtropical treelike herbs of the genus Musa having a terminal crown of large entire leaves and usually bearing hanging clusters of elongated fruits
Maize, known in some English-speaking countries as corn, is a large grain plant domesticated by indigenous peoples in Mesoamerica in prehistoric times.
Corn; a type of grain of the species Zea mays.
Maize, a grain crop of the species Zea mays.
A type of grain of the species Zea mays.
Tall annual cereal grass bearing kernels on large ears: widely cultivated in America in many varieties; the principal cereal in Mexico and Central and South America since pre-Columbian times
Widely grown domesticated grain plant, originally from Mesoamerica
A colour resembling that of the lemon; RAL-1012.
A shade of yellow, named for the cereal of the same name
Lemon is a color somewhat resembling yellow and named after the lemon fruit.
A yellow citrus fruit.
A deep yellow colour.
A strong yellow color
The color maize or corn refers to a shade of yellow; it is named for the cereal of the same name -- maize.
In culinary terms, a vegetable is an edible plant or its part, intended for cooking or eating raw.
A plant raised for some edible part of it.
Edible seeds or roots or stems or leaves or bulbs or tubers or nonsweet fruits of any of numerous herbaceous plant
Edible plant or part of a plant
A nutritional and culinary term that denotes any part of a plant that is commonly consumed by humans as food.
Any of various herbaceous plants having parts that are used as food.
The edible part of such a plant.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description:
An ear of corn, or maize, partially husked to show its buttery-yellow kernels.

Can be used to reference a form of NSFW content that is phonetically similar to "corn". This use is most prominent on platforms like Tiktok, with users attempting to subvert word censors and content filters.
apple_vendor_description: The ear of corn emoji on Apple devices stands tall and vibrant, showcasing a rich yellow kernel with subtle hints of green husk peeking through. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading enhances its texture, making each kernel appear plump and ripe under realistic lighting. This emoji, with its warm tones and detailed rendering on Apple devices, is a delightful symbol of harvest, abundance, and the simple pleasures of nature, often used to evoke feelings of autumn or healthy eating.
